.. _`bio/wgsim`:

WGSIM
=====

Short read simulator.

**URL**: 

Example
-------

This wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule wgsim:
        input:
            ref="genome.fa"
        output:
            read1="reads/1.fq",
            read2="reads/2.fq"
        log:
            "logs/wgsim/sim.log"
        params:
            "-X 0 -R 0 -r 0.1 -h"
        wrapper:
            "0.50.4-2418-g8fefa1e53/bio/wgsim"

Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.

When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.

Software dependencies
---------------------

* ``wgsim==1.0.0``
